prompt: A dark and vibrant fantasy art piece of an enigmatic swamp witch standing knee-deep in the murky waters of a mist-covered swamp. Her hands are raised as she casts a glowing spell, with ethereal, swampy elements swirling around her. The witch's attire is a mix of nature and magic, adorned with glowing plants and ancient tree roots. The background is filled with silhouettes of ancient trees, illuminated by soft, eerie floating lights, adding an enchanting and mysterious ambiance to the scene. The overall mood is one of mystical energy and foreboding, perfectly capturing the uncommon rarity of this swamp witch.
